title: [Badlands, Gully]
description: A landslide has left the underlying rock of the northern hillside bare.  The sandstone is a darker red than the greyish topsoil, and is colored in layers like an artist's palette.  Claw marks from some large creature mar the stone in places.

A landslide has left the underlying rock of the northern hillside bare.  The revealed sandstone is darker than the pale topsoil and is arranged in layers of varying shades of grey.  Claw marks from some large creature mar the stone in places.
